heading: Call Ahead
description: Learn the companyâ€™s business hours, and choose a safe time to pick up your cash. Daylight hours are best.

heading: Avoid High Crime Area
description: If you have the option of choosing a pickup location, find one in a neighbourhood you know.

heading: Bring Along A Fried
description: Carrying money alone can make you more vulnerable to theft.

heading: Keep Your Cash Hidden
description: To avoid being a target, put your money in a wallet or purse before leaving the office.

heading: Deposit Your Money Immediately
description: The likelihood of losing your money to theft or simple carelessness grows the longer you have it with you. Go straight to a bank to deposit your cash.
